issue.title: [Python] Allow to create field reference to nested fields that use indices
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16180](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16180). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As a follow-up to ARROW-11259 we should implement referencing nested fields that use indices (eg when creating a filter expression) once ARROW-15658 is closed.
